strings.Value: "Calm down â€” everything's under control. Just follow those guards there, and they'll take you to safety."
"Can't you see I'm busy here?! Stay out of the way!"
"Have you heard about the new levy to boost our town's defenses? I do hope you've already chipped in."
"Ha ha ha! A great day, isn't it? We're having a ball!"

{n}Elina, the local tavern keeper, runs up to you. Her face is pale, and she's shaking with fear.{/n} "Your Grace, wh-wh-what's happening? There are monsters... {g|Erastil}Erastil{/g}, save our souls... Is this the end? Is the town lost?"

{n}Elina takes a deep breath and exhales loudly a few times before looking back to you, devotion in her eyes.{/n} "Thank you, my baron{mf||ess}! I know you'll protect us!" {n}She gives you a quick bow before hastily walking toward the guards.{/n}
"Y-yes, of c-course, Your Grace! Forgive me..." {n}Continuing to mutter apologies, Elina runs away.{/n}
"N-no, Your Grace... Here, please... Just protect us, I beg you!" {n}Elina hands you her money pouch and runs away.{/n}
"A... a b-ball? Ha... Ha ha. Oh... Ha ha ha!" {n}Alternating delirious laughter with wails of terror, Elina runs away.{/n}
